T02D3081:176b-0: @176b ` // gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs chog bzhugs /
T02D3081:176b-2: * // bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3081:176b-3: gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos btsang ma bgos /
T02D3081:176b-4: spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o //
T02D3081:176b-5: snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o //
T02D3081:176b-6: mchod rten lnga gdab par bya //
T02D3081:176b-7: rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya /
T02D3081:176b-8: mchod rten ni grva bzhir gzhag par bya /
T02D3081:176b-9: gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya /
T02D3081:176b-10: shing bu btsugs te ba dan dmar po dbyang par bya'o //
T02D3081:176b-11: me tog gis gtor bar bya /
T02D3081:176b-12: bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag / grva bzhir pog phor bzhi dang /
T02D3081:176b-15: gu gul gyi dud pas bdug par bya'o //
T02D3081:176b-16: spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya /
T02D3081:176b-17: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya /
T02D3081:177a-3: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa /
T02D3081:177a-4: bu 'dod pa rnams dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par gzhag go //
T02D3081:177a-5: rma bya'i sgro lngas bya ba par bya'o //
T02D3081:177a-6: mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o //
T02D3081:177a-7: cho ga 'di lan gcig byas na bskal pa 'bum
T02D3081:177a-8: du byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur
T02D3081:177a-9: ro // kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug
T02D3081:177a-10: tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs
T02D3081:177a-11: pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /
T02D3081:177a-12: dam tshig la rnam par blta ba'i gzung sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug go //
T02D3081:177a-14: rnying pa bcos pa yang rung /
T02D3081:177a-15: de'i nang du gzhug / spos dang byug pa yang dbul lo //
T02D3081:177a-16: gzungs kyi sngags zlos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bskor bar bya /
T02D3081:177a-17: nyin zhag re la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o //
T02D3081:177a-18: de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su spos kyi dkyil 'khor bya /
T02D3081:177a-19: nyi ma la logs su me tog gis gtor ro //
T02D3081:177a-21: tu ruska'i du bas bdugs te /
T02D3081:177a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D3081:177a-23: mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab la rig sngags kyi
T02D3081:177a-24: snying po bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug
T02D3081:177a-25: / dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na gangg'a'i klung
T02D3081:177a-26: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu'i bye ma snyed
T02D3081:177a-27: kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung ring
T02D3081:177a-28: bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par 'gyur
T02D3081:177a-29: ro // snying po 'di bris la gzhug go //
